category: General Assembly of Representatives and Board of Directors Regulations/Article 8 (Passing of Minutes)
contents: Article 8 (Passing of minutes) ① The chairman shall have the moderator report the minutes of the previous general meeting at the first order of the opening and obtain approval from the general meeting. ② If there is anything to be modified or added to or subtracted from the minutes of the previous meeting, the Chairperson shall make the correction or addition or subtraction in accordance with the resolution of the general meeting and write the change in the minutes.
